data.name: Guild Hall Adventures
data.detailed_description:
ADD GUILD HALL ADVENTURES TO YOUR WISHLIST & FOLLOW FOR UPDATES

Make sure to add "Guild Hall Adventures" to your Steam Wishlist to get notified when the game comes out!


JOIN THE DISCORD


About the Game

Startup as a nobody, learn the basic skills in your hometown and start to build a life.
Then have it all taken away from you by a horde of monsters.

Where did they come from?
Why did they kill all your friends and family and destroy your whole town?

Tales of a distant Guild Hall come to mind, taking the journey to the North where the Guild Hall was supposed to reside...just to find it in ruin as well.
All the tales of the heroes that were training and getting mightier each day, no hope remained.
But you decided that you are going to take up the sword, build up the rubble of The Guild Hall and start your own adventuring group. Recruiting heroes and peasants to work for the town, defending against waves of monsters in a hack n slash game. Gather resources! Research new buildings, weapons, and tools. Craft new items and powerful weapons and armor.

Defeat the Monster Lords and the King of Monsters!
Your Journey starts with nothing, become the hero of all heroes and let's see how many waves you can survive.

Key features:

Gathering

Gather all the resources at the Guild Hall and in the surrounding areas for rare materials from woodcutting, mining & farming.


Crafting Gear & Producing Items

Produce rare to legendary items and craft gear forgotten through the ages.


Repair & Upgrade your town

Repair your Guild Hall town that was left in ruin by the monsters that destroyed it and make it flourish to be the strongest town.


Waves

Monsters breach the ancient long-forgotten portal where the Guild Hall town was built next to. Make sure the waves stay at bay and not destroy the world, if they get through, your buildings will feel the aftermath.


Dungeons

Find epic to legendary loot from the dungeons by defeating the monster lords reigning over their domain in the dungeons. The strongest heroes will easily clear the dungeons.


Research

Find out how to rebuild certain buildings at the research desk inside of the Guild Hall by providing the required materials.


The Tower

The tower of A 100 floors where adventurers delve in once they have reached the ultimate power. Only the bravest and strongest heroes ever venture into the Tower.

Loads of Loot

Killing monsters has never felt so rewarding for the chance of legendary loot drops. Waves give different loot than what dungeons will give, make sure to see what you can gain from which monsters.




Sign up for the NEWSLETTER
Kickstarter for the game will be released soon and we will need your support!
Stay in touch with the Newsletter: Website
Backers of the Kickstarter can join the Alpha testing phase.

Languages

Guild Hall Adventures aims to have all languages in the game, this will only be translated by fans and member that loves the game. Each person that contributes and gets to a certain point with assistance will be rewarded with exclusive in-game rewards.

data.short_description: Action-packed RPG story, Hack n Slash all monsters in your wake. Build a town from scratch and research while gathering resources and leveling up by killing monsters in the area. Don't forget to delve into the dungeons and defend your created town from the Hordes of Monsters coming to destroy it.
data.reviews:
“This reminds me of OG age of empires, when I was a boy I used to watch my dad play for hours. Thank you for this burst of nostalgia. Your game is beautiful.”
1000 – Jacob

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2377M @ 1.50GHZ +
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 720+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This is a Hack n Slash action RPG that involves killing monsters. Blood splatter when attacking enemies.
